name: 101-in-1 Party Megamix
description: 101-in-1 Party Megamix offers a collection of simple to play yet tough to master games everyone can enjoy! Players will have hours of fun flying, shooting, swimming, and much more. Earn medals and bonus prizes, plus play in groups of up to four in most games, and save up to four profiles. This is the ultimate bundle of fun at an unbeatable price!
